<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create recurring payment by Pix Key"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/receiver/recurring/payment/pix/key"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a Recurring Payment, using a Pix key.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Payload for Recurring Payment with Pix key.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["pixKey"],"type":"object","allOf":[{"required":["clientRequestId","recurringConsentPactualId","date","amount","riskSignals","document"],"type":"object","properties":{"clientRequestId":{"description":"Unique identifier provided by the client. Used as idempotency and response correlation.","type":"string"},"recurringConsentPactualId":{"description":"BTG's unique ID of the Recurring Consent.","type":"string"},"date":{"description":"Date in which the payment will be made. Format: yyyy-MM-dd.","type":"string","format":"date"},"amount":{"format":"int64","description":"Transaction amount in cents. Ex: R$25.34 is 2534.","type":"integer"},"remittanceInformation":{"description":"Additional information on a payment, to be sent to the recipient.","type":"string"},"riskSignals":{"description":"Recurring Payment risk signals. One of the objects must be informed.","type":"object","properties":{"manual":{"required":["deviceId","isRootedDevice","screenBrightness","elapsedTimeSinceBoot","osVersion","userTimeZoneOffset","language","screenDimensions","accountTenure"],"description":"Manual payment risk signals. This must be informed when the payment happens in the presence of the user.","type":"object","properties":{"deviceId":{"description":"Unique ID of the device.","type":"string"},"isRootedDevice":{"description":"Indicates if the device has the root permission.","type":"boolean"},"screenBrightness":{"description":"Current screen brightness. For Android it's an integer between 0 and 255. For iOS, it's a float number between 0.0 and 1.0.","type":"number"},"elapsedTimeSinceBoot":{"description":"How long the device has been on, in milliseconds.","type":"integer"},"osVersion":{"description":"Device's operational system version.","type":"string"},"userTimeZoneOffset":{"description":"Device's timezone in UTC offset: +-hh[:mm].","type":"string"},"language":{"description":"Device's language configuration, in ISO 639-1 format.","type":"string"},"screenDimensions":{"description":"Screen dimensions.","type":"object","properties":{"height":{"description":"Device's screen height, in pixels.","type":"integer"},"width":{"description":"Device's screen width, in pixels.","type":"integer"}}},"accountTenure":{"description":"Date that the user was registered in the ITP. Format: yyyy-MM-dd.","type":"string"},"geolocation":{"description":"Device's current geolocation.","type":"object","properties":{"latitude":{"description":"Device's current latitude location.","type":"number"},"longitude":{"description":"Device's current longitude location.","type":"number"},"type":{"description":"Mechanism used to gather the geolocation.","type":"string","enum":["COARSE","FINE","INFERRED"]}}},"isCallInProgress":{"description":"Indicates if there is an active call in progress. This must be sent if the user allowed this information to be collected.","type":"boolean"},"isDevModeEnabled":{"description":"Indicates if the device is on developer mode.","type":"boolean"},"isMockGPS":{"description":"Indicates if the device is using a mock GPS.","type":"boolean"},"isEmulated":{"description":"Indicates if the device is emulated or real.","type":"boolean"},"isMonkeyRunner":{"description":"Indicates the use of MonkeyRunner.","type":"boolean"},"isCharging":{"description":"Indicates if the device's battery is being charged.","type":"boolean"},"antennaInformation":{"description":"Indicates in which antenna the device is connected.","type":"string"},"isUsbConnected":{"description":"Indicates if the device is connected to another one via USB.","type":"boolean"},"integrity":{"description":"The integrity of the device and app. In Android according to Play API Integrity, in iOS according to App Attest.","type":"object","properties":{"appRecognitionVerdict":{"description":"App's integrity.","type":"string"},"deviceRecognitionVerdict":{"description":"Device's integrity.","type":"string"}}}},"title":"ObkRecRecurringPaymentRiskSignalsManual"},"automatic":{"required":["lastLoginDateTime"],"description":"Automatic payment risk signals. This must be informed when the payment happens without the presence of the user.","type":"object","properties":{"lastLoginDateTime":{"description":"Date and time of the last time the user has logged in the ITP. Format: RFC-3339 specification, UTC.","type":"string","format":"date"},"pixKeyRegistrationDateTime":{"description":"Date and time of the pix key registration. This must be informed if the payment is created using a pix key.  Format: RFC-3339 specification, UTC.","type":"string","format":"date"}},"title":"ObkRecRecurringPaymentRiskSignalsAutomatic"}},"title":"ObkRecRecurringPaymentRiskSignals"},"document":{"description":"Object containing document information","required":["identification","rel"],"type":"object","properties":{"identification":{"description":"The number of the document","type":"string","title":"Identification"},"rel":{"description":"The type of document (CPF/CNPJ)","type":"string","title":"Rel"}},"title":"Document"},"tags":{"description":"Tags that can be sent by the client, it will be saved on the Entity, use as a metadata field","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"example":["tag1","tag2"],"title":"Tags"}},"title":"ObkRecRecurringPaymentRequest"},{"type":"object"}],"properties":{"pixKey":{"description":"Key registered in the DICT belonging to the recipient. Key types can be: phone, email, cpf/cnpj or random key. In the case of a cell phone, it must be informed in the E.1641 standard. For e-mail it must have the format xxxxxxxx@xxxxxxx.xxx(.xx) and a maximum of 77 characters. In the case of CPF, it must be informed with 11 numbers, without dots or dashes. In the case of CNPJ, it must be informed with 14 numbers, without dots or dashes. In the case of a random key, the UUID generated by the DICT must be informed, according to the format specified in RFC41223.","type":"string"},"transactionIdentification":{"description":"Transaction identifier that must be retransmitted intact by the payer's PSP.","type":"string"}},"title":"ObkRecRecurringPaymentPixKeyRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
